import { Button, Col, Form, Input, Row, Select, Upload } from "antd" import UploadOutlined from "@ant-design/icons/lib/icons/UploadOutlined" const { Option } = Select const CreateBannerForm = () => { const onFinish = (values: object) => { console.log(values) } const onSearch = (value: any) => { console.log(value) } const normFile = (e: any) => { console.log("Upload event:", e) if (Array.isArray(e)) { return e } return e && e.fileList } return (
) } export default CreateBannerForm
